intro: Lesquerella douglasii, commonly known as the Douglas's lesquerella, is a perennial herb native to the southwestern United States. It is adapted to arid environments and thrives in well-drained soils. Lesquerella douglasii is known for its ability to produce a unique seed oil, which has been studied for potential industrial and cosmetic applications.
